name: root
description: ENS Registrar, management website and metadata website for takoyaki.eth subnames.

scripts.deploy-metadata-service: git subtree push --prefix metadata-service heroku master
scripts.deploy-metadata-service-force: git push heroku `git subtree split --prefix metadata-service  master`:master --force

author: Richard Moore <me@ricmoo.com> (https://www.ricmoo.com)
